702308f-a.title: Brooklyn: 3rd Street (South) - Berry Street
702308f-a.text:
110-12 South 3rd Street, adjoining the southest corner of Berry
Street, showing the old Brooklyn Hospital and Dispensary. 1t
first appe rs on an 1886 atlas of the City of Brooklyn. Sperr
2refers to it as ''The Relief,'' probably referring to it; being
used,at this tume,as a station of the Home Relief Bureau.
P. L. Sperr  May 1, 1936
NO REERODUCTIO1S
